channel.title: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Xydia-Banner-1.gif[/img][/center]
[center][b]Amazing Pking | Great Skills | Daily Updates | Awesome Economy | 24/7 Uptime | Friendly Community | High-Scores | Challenging PvM System | Custom Minigames[/b][/center]
[center][b][img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img] [URL=http://"xydiav2.comlu.com"]Play Now/Webclient[/URL] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"xydia.createaforum.com"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/trophicon.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://nostalgia.no-ip.biz/highscores/highscores.php"]High-Scores[/URL] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/testingicon.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35907711/XydiaV3.jar.jar"]Downloadable Client[/URL] [/b][/center]
[center][b]Introduction:[/b][/center] [b]Welcome to Xydia, the server is 317 based. We strive for player satisfaction, and also listen to what every user has to say. We add every suggestion given, and do tens or hundreds of updates per day. We love our player base, and have an amazing community. We also have a flawless pking system, fun custom minigames, amazing bosses, great economy, and other amazing features. Our goal is to make you happy, and provide you with a great community, and fun gameplay.[/b]
[center][B]Why Choose us:[/b] There are hundreds of RSPS' out there, but none like Xydia. We have totally branched off from the original 317 concept most other servers contain, and have created a much more fun environment and gameplay. We have lots of bosses, so that people who enjoy PvM can always have a variety of choices, we've also perfected every skill, and worked heavily on stability and server issues. The developement team does daily updates, and is always adding content to the game. We also interact with our players, and listen to everything they have to say. We have added custom minigames like The Gambler, and Nazi Zombies like no other server has. We continue to get better, respect every member, and would love to have you on board the community.
Features:
-TeamSpeak -Pking Highscores And Shop -Fun PK -Amazing Combat/Pking System -Vesta, Statius, Dragon Claws, Spirit shields, PVP weapons -Quick Trade System (Left Click ability) -Junk Shop -Getting Started And Easy starter sequence -The Gambler (Has little games you can gamble on, like Golden Key, and others to be added) -Custom bosses -Custom Minigames -Custom Quests -All Skills working -Fully working Castle Wars -Nazi Zombies (Includes Mystery box, Pack-A-Punch, 25 waves, King zombie, Rewards) -Highscores -All Godwars Bosses -Easy teleport navigation -Fully working sounds -All Special Attacks And many more.[/B][/CENTER]
[center][B]Media And Screenshots:[/B][/center]
[center]Starting Sequence:[/center] [center][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Startersequence1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/StarterSequence2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/StarterSequence3-1.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][center]Home:[/center][/b]
[center][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/XydiaHome.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Shops And Quick Trading System:[/b][/center]
[center] [img]http://i797.photobucket.com/albums/yy257/xxDANxx1/xydiaseries3-1.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Ardougnestalls.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Teleporting Navigation System:[/b][/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Teleport1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Teleport2.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center][b]Pking:[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2wcg01g.png[/img][/center]
[b][center]All skills:[/center][/b]
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/29d2ps.png[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Woodcutskill.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/slayer.jpg[/img][/center]
The Gambler: [CENTER][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/pic3.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center][b]GodWars Bosses:[/b][/center]
[CENTER][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/x28o3l.png[/img] [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/5220/kril1.png[/img] [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/8181/saradomin3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/armadyl1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/bandos1.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center]Castle Wars:[/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/pic.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center]Pest Control:[/center]
[center] [IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/Pestcontrol.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Jad/Fight Caves:[/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i535.photobucket.com/albums/ee360/maniacmike86/pic2.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center]Miscellaneous Pictures:[/center]
[CENTER][img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/3273/ablat.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2cdkin9.png[/img] [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/7051/kingroald.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=10pt][b]Videos:[/b][/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mhaZoBfNjUE]Xydia - New RSPS 2012 - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPLiGyxHn_g]Xydia - #PvM 1 - SlashBash - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q6tGTBnJZ7g&feature=plcp]Xydia - #PvM 2 - Bandos - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKmMWLgg-WA&list=UUh1sbr6MeylYpmSiQgvmSAg&index=2&feature=plcp]Xydia PKing Montage (Short) Join today! - YouTube[/url][/center]
[center][size=8pt][b]Conclusion:[/b][/size][/center] We are a very dedicated server, we love doing updates, adding content in-game, and fixing any problems. We still have lots of work to do on the forums, that will be happening very soon. We will continue to advance our gameplay, and stability, and we really hope you can join our community and be with us through some fun times. Thanks everyone for reading, hope to see you soon.[/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Notacoderlol:

Looks nice good luck man but I dont got time to fool around on a server thats eco will be screwed up by the gambleing.

I know what you mean, even though it’s a very rare chance of obtaining a key, I’ll modify the gambling and think of more unique ideas to put in place instead. I’ll recycle players money, instead of releasing into the game, to help boost the economy. Thanks though.

Also:
After doing a lot of work with the server the past couple of weeks, and months I started doing some work to the client, things that will come in the next 2-3 days are:

-PKP Orb (Shows PKP, Right clicking options: Open PK Shop, View Kill/Death Ratio, View PK Hiscores)
-Fully intergrated clan system and panel (We will be releasing a very cool clan/guild system)
-New interfaces for bosses/teleports (For example, you click the teleport, and an interface pops up warning you you’re teleporting)

Heres a little example of how the PKorb will function with the points (Right clicking doesn’t work yet):

I also fixed a lot of bugs, and cosmetic glitches today. I’m also going to add faster item switching, and a more accurate hit system for PKing tonight.

Remember if you have any suggestions to tell me, and I’ll add them,
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Haha, oh I got you. Yeah, I see what you mean, and I’ll try implement in some of your ideas to help keep the economy in better shape. This is why I like the new dicing system, it will only recycle money into the game from player to player, it won’t add money/weapons into the game.

Thanks for the feedback.

Read full topic
item.source: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7

item.title: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Any type of gambling makes it random. Whenever you can put a small amount of money into a game and win a larger amount of money your making it possible for there to be new money in the economy.

#1 rule of a stable economy, don’t make it so people can get phr33 money

If you are going to do it like gambling, make it an item that you can win(like a semi-rare ) but make it untradeable/unstakeable/etc

Read full topic

item.title: Xydia 317- New Server | Amazing Pking | Economy | Dicing | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Amazing Pking | Great Skills | Daily Updates | Awesome Economy | 24/7 Uptime | Friendly Community | High-Scores | Challenging PvM System | Custom Minigames[/center]

[center] Play Now/Webclient
Forums
High-Scores
Downloadable Client
[/center]

[center]Introduction:[/center]
Welcome to Xydia, the server is 317 based. We strive for player satisfaction, and also listen to what every user has to say. We add every suggestion given, and do tens or hundreds of updates per day. We love our player base, and have an amazing community. We also have a flawless pking system, fun custom minigames, amazing bosses, great economy, and other amazing features. Our goal is to make you happy, and provide you with a great community, and fun gameplay.

[center]Why Choose us:
There are hundreds of RSPS’ out there, but none like Xydia. We have totally branched off from the original 317 concept most other servers contain, and have created a much more fun environment and gameplay. We have lots of bosses, so that people who enjoy PvM can always have a variety of choices, we’ve also perfected every skill, and worked heavily on stability and server issues. The developement team does daily updates, and is always adding content to the game. We also interact with our players, and listen to everything they have to say. We have added custom minigames like The Gambler, and Nazi Zombies like no other server has. We continue to get better, respect every member, and would love to have you on board the community.

Features:

-TeamSpeak
-Pking Highscores And Shop
-Fun PK
-Amazing Combat/Pking System
-Vesta, Statius, Dragon Claws, Spirit shields, PVP weapons
-Quick Trade System (Left Click ability)
-Junk Shop
-Getting Started And Easy starter sequence
-The Gambler (Has little games you can gamble on, like Golden Key, and others to be added)
-Custom bosses
-Custom Minigames
-Custom Quests
-All Skills working
-Fully working Castle Wars
-Nazi Zombies (Includes Mystery box, Pack-A-Punch, 25 waves, King zombie, Rewards)
-Highscores
-All Godwars Bosses
-Easy teleport navigation
-Fully working sounds
-All Special Attacks
And many more.[/B][/CENTER]

Thanks everyone for reading, hope to see you soon.[/B][/CENTER]
